abstract: Former Rikers Island correction officer Brian Coll is convicted of violating civil rights of Ronald Spear, seriously ill inmate who died after Coll kicked him to death while other officers held him down, in 2012; Coll could face life imprisonment when he is sentenced; case highlights longstanding problems at Rikers, including culture of violence and code of silence among staff.
lead_paragraph: Brian Coll was convicted of violating the civil rights of the inmate, who died after he was kicked in the head while other officers held him down.

headline.main: Ex-Rikers Island Guard Is Found Guilty in Inmate’s Death
headline.print_headline: A Conviction in a Death at Rikers
